io.discloader.discloader.entity.message

Interface IMessage

  • All Superinterfaces:
    ISnowflake
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    Message

    public interface IMessage
extends ISnowflake
    Represents a message object on the api
    How to send messages 
     
 IMessage message = .sendMessage((String) content).join();
    Since:
    0.1.2
    Author:
    Perry Berman
    See Also:
    ITextChannel.sendMessage(String, RichEmbed), ISnowflake

    • Method Detail

      • canDelete

        boolean canDelete()
        Checks if the user you are logged in as is able to delete the message. Should return true if either: you are the messsage's author, or you have the Permissions.MANAGE_MESSAGES permission.
        Returns:
        true if you can delete the message, false otherwise.

      • canEdit

        boolean canEdit()
        Only the message's author is able to edit said message.
        Returns:
        true if you are able to edit the message , otherwise false.

      • delete

        java.util.concurrent.CompletableFuture<IMessage> delete()
        Deletes the message if the loader has suficient permissions
        Returns:
        A Future that completes with this when sucessfull
        See Also:
        DLUtil.PermissionFlags

        IGuildMember getMember()
        If the message was sent in a IGuildTextChannel the author's IGuildMember object should be returned. Unless the message was sent by a webhook
        Returns:
        The member who sent the message. possibly null
